content: this is a summary of a legal case in which one party referred to as gd is seeking a divorce from the other party referred to as ed the court issued a final resolution ordering gd to cover the procedural costs the case lasted for four months the court approved a compromise agreement between the parties regarding the division of their common property one party will become the sole owner of a specific apartment while the other party will receive financial compensation the payment of the compensation is postponed with the first installment due on a specific date changes will be made to the land register to reflect the new ownership arrangement the court terminated the proceedings and explained the consequences and obligations of the parties the judgment regarding the divorce can be appealed within a certain timeframe the court also determined the distribution of procedural costs the judge summarizing the case did not provide specific details about the parties involved and referred to certain articles of the code which were not mentioned in the summary

metadata.marital_regime: issues relatively division of common properties
